headline: Pennsylvania American Water Completes Acquisition of Manwalamink Water and Sewer Company Systems
summary: MECHANICSBURG, Pa., June 25, 2025--Pennsylvania American Water announced today that it has completed its acquisition of Manwalamink Water and Sewer Company’s (Manwalamink) water and wastewater systems. The newly acquired systems serve approximately 1,260 water and 1,260 wastewater connections in Middle Smithfield and Smithfield townships in Monroe County.

headline: American Water CEO to Share Expertise at 2025 Mid-America Regulatory Conference
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., June 25, 2025--American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., is participating in the 2025 Mid-America Regulatory Conference (MARC), taking place June 22 through June 25, 2025, in Indianapolis, Indiana.

headline: California Water Boosts Wastewater Operations Through Silverwood Deal
summary: CWT expands into Silverwood's wastewater systems, boosting sustainability and growth across California's water sector.

headline: AMG Boston Common Global Impact Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: The AMG Boston Common Global Impact Fund returned -3.81% for the first quarter of 2025, compared with -1.33% for the benchmark, the MSCI ACWI Index.
